channel.title: CVE Feed for First Co., Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for First Co., Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47213|2024-08-02T21:01:22.825Z -- first%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- cfr-904e%2C%20cfr-908e%2C%20cfr-916e
item.description: First Corporation's DVRs use a hard-coded password, which may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to rewrite or obtain the configuration information of the affected device. Note that updates are provided only for Late model of CFR-4EABC, CFR-4EAB, CFR-8EAB, CFR-16EAB, MD-404AB, and MD-808AB. As for the other products, apply the workaround.

item.title: CVE-2023-47674|2024-08-02T21:16:43.197Z -- first%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- cfr-904e%2C%20cfr-908e%2C%20cfr-916e
item.description: Missing authentication for critical function vulnerability in First Corporation's DVRs allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to rewrite or obtain the configuration information of the affected device. Note that updates are provided only for Late model of CFR-4EABC, CFR-4EAB, CFR-8EAB, CFR-16EAB, MD-404AB, and MD-808AB. As for the other products, apply the workaround.
